home_featured_desc: A modular admin dashboard built with React and Tailwind. State is managed via Zustand & React Query; data grids with TanStack Table; charts with Recharts; UI components with MUI; animations powered by Framer Motion.
home_featured_footer: Modular tables, filters, charts & layout primitives for real-world dashboards.
home_intro: I’ve built data-heavy UIs in real projects (admin panels and digital restaurant UI). DevDash packages those patterns—robust tables, filters, and charts—into reusable pieces. It reflects my day-to-day stack and the way I structure production UIs.
